channel.title: Quick help with adding somthing to wizzup?s powerminer! plz
channel.description:
ok ive been using wizzup?s powerminer and i must say its one of the best scripts ive ever used everything works brilliantly and i would be very happy leaving it over night without worrying.....however, this script has not got any procedure..etc to drop/eat all the random event items you get... so basically after about 3 hours of playing my pack is full of random event items :P
so i was wondering if somone could point me in the right direction on where i could get/help with a procedure so i can make this script drop the random event items also!
thanks :)[br][size=1]Posted at: December 01, 2006, 11:26:24 AM[/size][hr]can anyone help??

item.title: Quick help with adding somthing to wizzup?s powerminer! plz
item.dc:creator: @N4TH4N N4TH4N
item.description:
@N4TH4N wrote:

Did you fill in your player array information?

Read full topic
item.source: Quick help with adding somthing to wizzup?s powerminer! plz

item.title: Quick help with adding somthing to wizzup?s powerminer! plz
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Put this somewhere in the script:
[scar]Procedure dropal;
begin
dropto(2,28);
end;[/scar]

And put this in the mining procedure or in the main loop.
[scar]dropal;[/scar]

Read full topic
item.source: Quick help with adding somthing to wizzup?s powerminer! plz
